resources.string: Rick, Maggie, and Ezekiel rally their communities to flood the Sanctuary with walkers, trapping Negan. During the war, key Savior members grow suspicious of each other while the Hilltop and Kingdom are overwhelmed by the Saviors. Alexandria is attacked after Negan is freed. \nAs Carl retreats the residents to the sewers, they are horrified to discover Carl has been bitten.
